data: About Us About Pranjal Projects Founded in 1980, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. has established itself as a leading name in the sheet metal fabrication and infrastructure industries. With over 40 years of excellence, we are ISO 9001:2008 and RDSO certified, known for delivering high-quality steel bridges, Pre-Engineered Building (PEB) solutions, and large-scale infrastructure projects. Beyond our expertise in infrastructure, Pranjal Projects is also a trusted manufacturer of earth-moving equipment parts, boilers, and heavy engineering equipment for the oil and gas sector. Our advanced steel fabrication capabilities allow us to serve diverse industries, providing precise, durable solutions that meet the rigorous demands of these sectors. With a robust portfolio of successful projects and state-of-the-art facilities, Pranjal Projects remains at the forefront of engineering excellence, delivering comprehensive solutions that drive India’s infrastructure growth and support critical sectors like oil and gas and heavy machinery. Mission Deliver high-quality structural steel solutions through exceptional service and customized approaches that exceed customer expectations, fostering trust and long-term success. Vision To shape India’s infrastructure by delivering quality, innovative projects that drive the nation’s progress towards becoming a global powerhouse. Values Integrity in all interactions, innovation through cutting-edge solutions, a commitment to sustainability with eco-friendly practices, especially in renewable energy, and excellence in meeting global standards to create lasting value. Promoters H.C. Bhatia Chairman Vekas Bhatia Managing Director Deepak Bhatia Managing Director Aryan Raj Bhatia Director Request a Quote
